title: Hoodteez The Waves are Calling and I Must Go Hooded Sweatshirt

Pre Shrunk 50% cotton, 50% polyester ; double-needle coverseaming on neck, armholes and waistband

Width of Sweatshirt in inches S=20, M=22, L=24, XL=26, XXL=28
description: Hoodteez Sweatshirt Hoodies are 50% cotton, 50% polyester and good for any occasion. They are fully machine washable. Wash inside out in COLD Water on a delicate cycle. Hang dry or dry on no heat setting.
